import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))
source.4c85770b:
print('Mode:', price.mode()[0])
print('Median:', price.median())
print('Mean:', price.mean())
print('Range:', price.max() - price.min())
print('S.E. mean:', price.std() / np.sqrt(price.count()))
IQR = price.quantile(0.75)-price.quantile(0.25)
print('IQR:', IQR)
print('IQR deviation:', IQR / 2)
print('Decile ratio:', price.quantile(0.9) / price.quantile(0.1))
source.2628f3d3:
music_17 = data[(data['cont_rating'] == "17+") & (data['prime_genre'] == 'Music')]
music_17_count = music_17['id'].count()
part = music_17_count / data[data['prime_genre'] == 'Music']['id'].count()
print('Count:', music_17_count)
print('Percent:', (part*100))
source.d25ecbb8:
genre_by_rating = data.groupby('cont_rating')['prime_genre'].value_counts()
print('4+ :', genre_by_rating['4+'][:1])
print('9+ :', genre_by_rating['9+'][:1])
print('12+ :', genre_by_rating['12+'][:1])
print('17+ :', genre_by_rating['17+'][:1])
